game.name: Kiba Kumba Jungle Chaos
game.description:
Kiba & Kumba: Jungle Chaos is a good choice for all those kids who love spending good hours over the internet to play online games. Once you get yourself involved in this platform game, you will surely be addicted to it and play it again and again when you will get time in future. In this beautifully-designed adventure game, you will get a chance to witness a number of things like countless traps, evil robot penguins and lots of action. 

Play this popular and highly challenging adventure game in 4 different worlds. The very cute monkeys Kiba and Kumba are ready to get participated in a fight against the evil Dr. Slip van Ice. All you need to do is help them to deal with different obstacles confidently in this jump "n" run game. These two monkeys are crazy for bouncing in a way that they like bananas. Play it today and become the part of another crazy adventure. Jump over the obstacles in this easy-to-play platform game after selecting your desired character. 

The primary key to winning this cool free online game is to help the monkeys to escape the threat of all the villains that will come on your way and collect all the things you will see in this exciting journey of monkeys. Distributed by Famobi, Kiba and Kumba Jungle Chaos is a fantastic adventure online game in which you get a chance to choose your character between the male ? Kumba or the female one ? Kiba. Run through deserts, forests, jungles and an Antarctica-like region in this flash game. Do not forget to collect the maximum possible treasures and bananas to score higher.

game.mobileControlKeys: L ICONS TO MOVE L-R, RIGHT ICONS TO JUMP AND ROLL
game.webControlKeys: SPACE , UP ARROW - JUMP, L-R ARROW TO MOVE, DOWN ARROW TO BEND
